name: Kaashyap Technologies
overview: Kaashyap Technologies Limited provides information technology (IT) consulting services, including designing and constructing systems for the large, and small and medium enterprise segments. It offers solutions for SAP projects, software development, service oriented architecture (SOA), and industry specific requirements. The companyâ€™s SAP solutions include certified solutions, upgrade services, implementations, rollout services, offshore outsourcing, maintenance and support, consulting services, and business transformation services. Its IT services comprise software development and services, infrastructure consulting services, managed services, IT security and risk management, and SOA. Kaashyap Technologies also offers professional IT staffing services; and Microsoft solutions, including enterprise solutions, .Net application development, core infrastructure, and other professional services.
